thread.title: Police search for creep who starved dog
thread.title_full: Police search for creep who starved dog - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Police search for creep who starved dog
text:
Adopt a Boxer Rescue Brewster, a horribly emaciated dog that was found wandering in Queens earlier this week. A rescue group is offering $1,500 for information on what happened to the dog. Police are trying to find out who starved a friendly pooch found dumped in a Queens field earlier this week.
The boxer weighed just 25 pounds when he was brought into New York Animal Care Centers Tuesday.
“He should have weighed at least 50 pounds,” said Amy Swift of Adopt a Boxer Rescue, a group helping care for the neglected pup.
Related Stories Dog starved, thrown out in suitcase in Bronx British lawyer jailed for 18 weeks for leaving dog to starve Connecticut dog starved to death
